text:
Human Code | iOS, Python, Web Dev, Statistical Geneticists | Denver, CO

We are a Denver startup who is building a team that will change the way people use and interact with their DNA. Translating science into a daily experience, our goal is to unlock the world of genomics through easy-to-use apps. If you want to join a company where you can make an impact, provide value on day one, and work with a great team email me at ryan@humancode.xyz
